verses.text: \w First|strong="G4413"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w I|strong="G3767"\w* \w urge|strong="G3870"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w petitions|strong="G1783"\w*, \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w*, \w intercessions|strong="G1783"\w*, \w and|strong="G3767"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* offered \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w*—

\w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w kings|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w authority|strong="G5247"\w*—\w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w lead|strong="G1236"\w* \w tranquil|strong="G2263"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w quiet|strong="G2272"\w* lives \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dignity|strong="G4587"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* pleasing \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sight|strong="G1799"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Savior|strong="G4990"\w*,

\w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w wants|strong="G2309"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* truth.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w mediator|strong="G3316"\w* \w between|strong="G3316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* men, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G1520"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*,

\w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w Himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w as|strong="G1438"\w* \w a|strong="G1325"\w* ransom \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*—\w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3142"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w at|strong="G3588"\w* \w just|strong="G1438"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w right|strong="G2540"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3739"\w* reason \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w appointed|strong="G5087"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w preacher|strong="G2783"\w*, \w an|strong="G2532"\w* apostle, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* faithful \w and|strong="G2532"\w* true \w teacher|strong="G1320"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*. \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1473"\w* \w telling|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* truth; \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1473"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lying|strong="G5574"\w* \w about|strong="G1722"\w* anything.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w want|strong="G1014"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w* everywhere \f + \fr 2:8 \ft Or in every place (of worship)\f* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w pray|strong="G4336"\w*, \w lifting|strong="G1869"\w* \w up|strong="G1869"\w* \w holy|strong="G3741"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w anger|strong="G3709"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w dissension|strong="G1261"\w*. Instructions to Women

\w Likewise|strong="G5615"\w*, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* want \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w adorn|strong="G2885"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w respectable|strong="G2887"\w* \w apparel|strong="G2887"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* modesty, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w self-control|strong="G4997"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w braided|strong="G4117"\w* \w hair|strong="G4117"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w gold|strong="G5553"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w pearls|strong="G3135"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w expensive|strong="G4185"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2441"\w*,

\w but|strong="G3739"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w good|strong="G1223"\w* \w deeds|strong="G2041"\w*, \w as|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w proper|strong="G4241"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* profess \w to|strong="G1135"\w* worship \w God|strong="G1861"\w*.

\w A|strong="G1722"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \f + \fr 2:11 \ft Or wife; also in verse 12\f* \w must|strong="G1135"\w* \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w quietness|strong="G2271"\w* \w and|strong="G1135"\w* \w full|strong="G3956"\w* \w submissiveness|strong="G5292"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w do|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w permit|strong="G2010"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w or|strong="G3761"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* exercise authority \w over|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w man|strong="G3756"\w*;\f + \fr 2:12 \ft Or over her husband\f* \w she|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w remain|strong="G1510"\w* \w quiet|strong="G2271"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* Adam \w was|strong="G4111"\w* \w formed|strong="G4111"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w and|strong="G4413"\w* \w then|strong="G1534"\w* \w Eve|strong="G2096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* Adam \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w deceived|strong="G1818"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w deceived|strong="G1818"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fell|strong="G1096"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* \w transgression|strong="G3847"\w*.

Women, \w however|strong="G1161"\w*, \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w childbearing|strong="G5042"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w continue|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, love, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* holiness, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w self-control|strong="G4997"\w*.
